a.n: Versailles, Le Palais Retrouv√© Du Roi-soleil

p.d: During the reign of Louis XIV and the centuries that followed, the Palace of Versailles was constantly being modified. Most of the constructions and areas present at its creation have long disappeared. Thanks to the digitization of some 10,000 plans of the palace researchers are now recreating this vanished past. Directed by: Marc Jampolsky (France, 2018)
